li.p: Place a cursor in the location where you would like to xinclude another document

note.p: You can also include a document "as text". For this use Entity XInclude Text File... command.

li.p: Browse for the document you wish to xinclude. Serna will read it with its DTD and/or XML Schema in order to determine the IDs available in the document
In the XInclude XML File Dialog choose either the ID of the element you wish to insert into your document or "Insert Whole Document"
You may also change/add XInclude attributes. Hit Attributes... button for the XInclude Attributes Dialog.
Click OK . The xincluded document will show up in xinclude brackets.
